@prashant
How much time does it take you to encode a movie? And how much time to upload the same?

@sid
IT takes abt 20 hrs or more to encoded a 2 hr movie..
Ofcourse I hv a slow pc that's why it takes time..
And abt 9-10 hrs to upload a 700mb movie..

damn 

it must be frustrating to start again after 9-10 hours of encoding

you are doing a great job........keep up the good work
Ya its very frustrating...more frustrating when u r so close to completion and lights r cut..

@prashant
what!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Are you serious??????That much patience and efforts !!!!!!overall its takes more than a day, to upload a movie. 
And, God, I didnt asked the time taken to download the source. I guess a day more!!!!!!!
Im speechless. Salute you buddy.

Iam surprised..that all of u guys r dloading these encoded movies for so long & never knew that it takes a day or more to encode.. 
even a 5 min music video takes half an hour to encode (& i have a pretty fast pc)
@prashant : ty for the movie dude...
i hav a question though...
wat do u do with the source after encoding that movie... i mean do u keep em or delete them?

@sid
Ya overall it takes 2 days...sometimes 2 nd half days if source is big like 6.5gb...

& yeah powercuts r so fking common in india... thats y encoding on pc is very hectic work..
(if only i had a laptop LOL)
keep up the good work anyways... :D

@DSIN
Many people don't know..even I didn't knew..it was only when I started encoding I came to know..
That's why I cannot control my anger when some people say don't waste ur time its already done..they don't realise how much patience n effort it takes to do one single movie..although now I don't care what some people say because many love my work nd wait for my uploads..and this is the only thing that keeps me going..

Unfortunately I hv to delete the source..I only hv 480gb of hard disk..
@prashant: I hav a request,pls do step up in 5.1 channel.....plssss......
